programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town(n)

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: The new kid in town (Alex Pettyfer) is a nomad who discovers, when mysterious assassins track him down, that he's from a lot farther away than he ever knew. Dianna Agron and Timothy Olyphant costar in this sci-fi teen thriller(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: A week before he's set to move across the country with his girlfriend, a young man impulsively sets out on a solo road trip across the US to see the nation's largest objects in this comedy of self-discovery

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two quirky friends who became unlikely legends by hosting a radio show that introduced the world to the biggest hip-hop artists of the 90s, including Nas, Biggie, Wu-Tang, Jay-Z, Eminem and the Fugees. Includes interviews with the rap world's luminaries

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Cut in Half
programme.desc: Two Muslim sisters and their family must cope with the eldest daughter's leukemia diagnosis and her decisions about life and death. Directed by Susan Seidelman (‘Desperately Seeking Susan'). Written by Leen Shumman

programme.title: The Drew
programme.desc: The incredible story of the unlikely rise of The Drew League from humble beginnings in the crime and gang infested streets of South Central Los Angeles to the nation's foremost pro-am basketball league. Crossing racial, cultural and socioeconomic barriers, The Drew celebrates the value of basketball, persistence, loyalty and above all, community. Featuring NBA stars Kevin Durant, DeMar DeRozan, Brandon Jennings and Baron Davis

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a publicity stunt brings the New York Rangers and the national spotlight to Mystery, Alaska for a game against the local team of weekend warriors, the town rises to meet the challenge of a lifetime. Russell Crowe, Hank Azaria, and Burt Reynolds lead an all-star cast(n)

programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n)

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them(n)

programme.title: House of D
programme.desc: David Duchovny wrote, directed and costars in this sweet coming-of-age drama starring Anton Yelchin as a 13-year-old boy living in New York's Greenwich Village in 1973, whose best friend is a mentally challenged adult (Robin Williams) and whose romantic mentor in matters of the heart is a female prisoner (Erykah Badu) in the nearby Women's House of Detention. Tea Leoni and Zelda Williams costar(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Get The Girl
programme.desc: A wealthy young man is conned into staging a fake kidnapping in order to play the hero and win the affection of a girl he's madly in love with. But when one of the hired hands is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to actually save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Captivity
programme.desc: A supermodel is kidnapped and imprisoned in a cell by an obsessed psychopath, then subjected to horrific mental and physical torture in this controversial horror film starring Elisha Cuthbert and Pruitt Taylor Vince, directed by Roland Joffe

programme.title: Witless Protection
programme.desc: A bumbling deputy (Larry the Cable Guy) mistakes a federal witness for a kidnapping victim and takes her into "protective custody," thereby incurring the wrath of the FBI and a slew of unsavory criminals. Jenny McCarthy costars in this wacky comedy with Peter Stormare, Eric Roberts, Ivana Milicevic, Yaphet Kotto (as the same character he played in "Midnight Run") and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: A week before he's set to move across the country with his girlfriend, a young man impulsively sets out on a solo road trip across the US to see the nation's largest objects in this comedy of self-discovery

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: Documentary from Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney that explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 that was allegedly commissioned by the US and Israeli governments to sabotage Iran's nuclear program that opened up a Pandora's box of cyber warfare

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Permanent Midnight
programme.desc: Ben Stiller gives the performance of a lifetime in this searing, dark-humored drama based on the autobiography by Jerry Stahl. A hardcore heroin addict, Stahl nevertheless finds success as a writer for an insipid network television series and love with a gorgeous movie executive (Elizabeth Hurley), then proceeds to blow it all in the quest to maintain his habit. Owen Wilson costars in this chilling cautionary tale

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Detention (2004)
programme.desc: A fed up teacher gets more than he bargained for on his last day on the job - while he monitors an after-school detention class filled with a ragtag bunch of ruffians, he discovers that the school has been taken over by a gang of terrorists but little do they know that he is a former Marine

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife

programme.title: 11 Blocks
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller about a man whose wife is held hostage by a corrupt police chief and a hired assassin, forcing him to do the impossible: traverse 11 gang-controlled city blocks to save her life

programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A group of four friends who rent a luxury yacht for a weekend of sun and sailing find themselves in a nightmare scenario when they are left floating in the ocean as their vessel drifts out of reach - with one stranded mother's newborn infant on board alone. Eric Dane, Susan May Pratt, Ali Hillis and Niklaus Lange star in this taut thriller

programme.desc: Lea Thompson and Victoria Jackson star in a first-rate sex comedy about two women looking for love at a health resort and confronting the changing sexual attitudes of society. Andrew Dice Clay also stars

programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: It's the last day of high school before summer vacation somewhere in middle America - 1976. The story follows the conflicts faced by Randy "Pink" Floyd, Mitch Kramer, Sabrina, Slater, Mike, and Wooderson. When the day dawns on the football field where several of them have gathered, the future might look bleak, but not totally without hope. Like it or not, the forced environment and resultant camaraderie that school has created for them is the closest thing they've known to home during these "best years" of their lives

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: It's the last day of high school before summer vacation somewhere in middle America - 1976. The story follows the conflicts faced by Randy "Pink" Floyd, Mitch Kramer, Sabrina, Slater, Mike, and Wooderson. When the day dawns on the football field where several of them have gathered, the future might look bleak, but not totally without hope. Like it or not, the forced environment and resultant camaraderie that school has created for them is the closest thing they've known to home during these "best years" of their lives(n)

programme.title: The Moor
programme.desc: His coffers depleted by his expensive rise to power, Rodrigo seeks funds through a profitable marriage for Lucrezia that will ally with him Milan, and charges a fee for safe haven in the Holy City to Jews displaced by the Spanish Inquisition; the Borgias host a charming Turkish prince; Micheletto is ordered to rid his patrons of the ongoing threat posed by Della Rovere(n)

programme.title: Lucrezia's Wedding
programme.desc: Lucrezia's financially and politically motivated wedding to Milanese nobleman Giovanni Sforza is a disaster thanks to Juan's inappropriately bawdy play in his sister's honor, Cesare's brazen flirting with a married baroness, and the arrival of the Borgia children's illegitimate mother; Della Rovere seeks the aid of the illustrious Medici family and their counselor, Machiavelli(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute(n)

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young couple live in a broken-down car parked alongside Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, spending their days in a ritual of scamming, thieving and scoring heroin to feed their addiction until they must confront the difficult truth about their relationship(n)

programme.title: Listen To Me Marlon
programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: A high-profile slaying becomes the case of an ambitious attorney's career. Martin Vail (Richard Gere) is a famed defense lawyer who volunteers his services to Aaron Stampler (Edward Norton), a Kentucky teenager charged with the murder of a Chicago archbishop. Vail's case becomes more complicated than expected when a psychologist concludes that Stampler suffers from multiple personality disorder. Now the cynical, opportunistic attorney is faced with a daunting prospect, a client who may actually deserve his best defense(n)

programme.title: The Boston Strangler
programme.desc: Crime thriller about a wise cracking, small time criminal with an unrelenting sex drive who concocts a plan with his cellmate to confess to the crimes of the Boston Strangler and gain notoriety and reward money(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: A high-profile slaying becomes the case of an ambitious attorney's career. Martin Vail (Richard Gere) is a famed defense lawyer who volunteers his services to Aaron Stampler (Edward Norton), a Kentucky teenager charged with the murder of a Chicago archbishop. Vail's case becomes more complicated than expected when a psychologist concludes that Stampler suffers from multiple personality disorder. Now the cynical, opportunistic attorney is faced with a daunting prospect, a client who may actually deserve his best defense(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: : Best of Showtime Boxing 2016
programme.desc: Hard-hitting retrospective of highlights from 2016's biggest knockouts and most exciting fights. Featuring Thurman, Wilder, Joshua, Garcia, Santa Cruz, Frampton and more in huge bouts and emotional moments both in and out of the ring

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between

programme.title: How to Be a Player
programme.desc: A playboy whose only objective in life seems to be having sex with as many girls as possible without getting caught has the tables turned on him at a party where all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance

programme.title: Reaper
programme.desc: When a death row inmate survives his execution and returns as a supernatural, unholy creature, a mysterious community of drifters and criminals must band together to defeat the monster or perish in the depths of hell

programme.title: The Boston Strangler
programme.desc: Crime thriller about a wise cracking, small time criminal with an unrelenting sex drive who concocts a plan with his cellmate to confess to the crimes of the Boston Strangler and gain notoriety and reward money

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: In the final installment of the Evil Dead trilogy, Bruce Campbell returns as heroic Ash, the man with a chainsaw for a hand and a quip for every situation - no matter how bizarre that occasion might be

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: In this visually awe-inspiring sci-fi adventure, a psychic (Dennis Quaid) who uses his ESP abilities only for financial gain is hired to project himself into the dreams of scientific subjects as part of a groundbreaking clinical study. When he discovers a plot to assassinate the president of the United States, however, he must put aside his mercenary nature to literally save the world

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: In the final installment of the Evil Dead trilogy, Bruce Campbell returns as heroic Ash, the man with a chainsaw for a hand and a quip for every situation - no matter how bizarre that occasion might be

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: Bey vs. Molina (R)
programme.desc: Mickey Bey (18-0-1, 9 KOs) vs. John Molina (25-3, 20 KOs) in a 10-round lightweight bout. Live from the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas. REPLAY

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Sexual Sanctuary
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about an English couple who are invited to a strange villa where nothing is as it seems. After a series of desperate moves and sexual advances by the villa's inhabitants, will Aaron and Katie figure out what's really going on or will their new infatuations blind them from the truth?

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Get The Girl
programme.desc: A wealthy young man is conned into staging a fake kidnapping in order to play the hero and win the affection of a girl he's madly in love with. But when one of the hired hands is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to actually save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: The New Generation
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" features young, talented contenders matched tough with a philosophy of competitive fights featuring the next generation of boxing stars that provide a proving ground for prospects determined to fight for a world title(n)

programme.title: : Best of Showtime Boxing 2016
programme.desc: Hard-hitting retrospective of highlights from 2016's biggest knockouts and most exciting fights. Featuring Thurman, Wilder, Joshua, Garcia, Santa Cruz, Frampton and more in huge bouts and emotional moments both in and out of the ring(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims(n)

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel(n)

programme.title: Detention (2004)
programme.desc: A fed up teacher gets more than he bargained for on his last day on the job - while he monitors an after-school detention class filled with a ragtag bunch of ruffians, he discovers that the school has been taken over by a gang of terrorists but little do they know that he is a former Marine(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: Larry has his life turned upside-down when he's saddled with a rookie partner and assigned to investigate an outbreak of mysterious food poisonings at the city's swankiest restaurants. Infuriating restaurateurs with his bad manners, Larry nevertheless manages to charm a sweet, shy waitress into a budding romance. But when unorthodox methods cost him his health inspector job, Larry has to go undercover to bring the conspirators to justice(n)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: Alonzo Bodden: Historically Incorrect
programme.desc: Alonzo Bodden returns with a comedic look at the historical inaccuracies of the present and past in an all-new stand-up comedy event that exposes the hypocrisy - and hilarity - of modern day culture(n)

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special(n)

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all(n)

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Tears and Tortillas
programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez returns as hockey coach Gordon Bombay in this fun-filled family sequel. Sidelined by a knee injury, Gordon is offered a chance to coach the USA's team at the Goodwill Games in Los Angeles, but his head is quickly turned by lucrative endorsement deals and the good life on the left coast. Kathryn Erbe and Michael Tucker costar

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: It Runs in the Family (2003)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and his legendary actor father Kirk Douglas team up on-screen for the first time with this comedy about a successful businessman whose midlife crisis inspires him to reach out to several generations of his family, with decidedly comic results. Bernadette Peters costars

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life(n)

programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)(n)

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs

programme.title: Play It Forward

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Leigh delivers another glimpse of British working-class life with a moving, humanistic tale capturing both the desperation and bittersweet humor of its subjects' lives. Phil (Timothy Spall), a scruffy cab driver, his common-law life Penny (Lesley Manville) and their two overweight children reside in one of South London's ubiquitous concrete housing developments. When an unexpected crisis descends upon Phil and Penny, they are forced to face and affirm some of life's timeless verities. "Richly satisfying" ("The Guardian")

programme.title: Bride of the Wind
programme.desc: A century ago, Alma Schindler was the darling of Vienna's art world. She posed for Gustav Klimt; she married the city's greatest composer, Gustav Mahler and revolutionary architect Walter Gropius; she had a tumultuous affair with the expressionist painter Oskar Kokoschka and escaped Europe on the eve of WWII with author Franz Werfel. Long celebrated in legend, song and gossip, Alma's life is colorfully recreated in this sumptuous biography starring Sarah Wynter, Jonathan Pryce and Vincent Perez

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with W. Kamau Bell

programme.title: Blood Sand

In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Mission Impossible II
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) takes on a renegade spy who's stolen a deadly high-tech virus. John Woo directed this convoluted sequel with spectacular action. Thandie Newton, Dougray Scott, Ving Rhames. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Thirteen
programme.desc: An impressionable teen is lured into a life of sex, drugs and crime when she befriends a charismatic classmate. Harrowingly realistic, but may be too intense for some viewers. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A rigid LA cop is assigned a wisecracking partner and together they probe religious cult murders. When the former falls for an intended sacrifice victim, he is taken off of the case, leaving his irreverent partner to save the day. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Grey Gardens
programme.desc: A docudrama about Big Edie and Little Edie, the aunt and cousin of Kennedy-Onassis respectively. The reclusive socialites made headlines when the health department threatened to raid their dilapidated East Hampton, N.Y., mansion in the early 1970s. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Longtime rivals compete for the attentions of a widow, their alluring new neighbor; but they may have to reconcile when their adult children become attracted to one another. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Tashi and the Monk
programme.desc: A visit to a home for orphans and abandoned children in northeastern India that was founded by a former Buddhist monk, who's reminded of his own troubled childhood by an unruly new arrival. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Soul Food
programme.desc: Saga of three sisters who must sort out their differences when their beloved mother becomes ill. The story is seen through the eyes of Ahmad, the young son of one of the sisters. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker known to his friends as "The Dude" gets mixed up in a convoluted kidnapping plot with an eccentric millionaire whose name he shares. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: From his beginnings on the mean streets of Brooklyn to becoming an East Coast hip-hop sensation, the life and death of rapper Notorious B.I.G. is chronicled in this biopic. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: A lonely writer falls for his computer's operating system, which has the voice of a woman and the ability to grow and learn. Their relationship quickly turns more intimate, but in time their differences begin to outweigh their similarities. Meanwhile, he struggles with a difficult divorce from his childhood sweetheart. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Defiant Ones
programme.desc: Part 3 of 4. Jimmy co-founds Interscope Records and cuts a deal with Death Row Records to become the label's distributor. But hostility mounts across America at the violence in rap music. Jimmy, Snoop Dogg and Tupac Shakur become embroiled in a violent feud with East Coast rap rivals, including Sean "Puffy" Combs and his Bad Boy Records. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: From his beginnings on the mean streets of Brooklyn to becoming an East Coast hip-hop sensation, the life and death of rapper Notorious B.I.G. is chronicled in this biopic. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project *
programme.desc: Three student filmmakers are terrorized in the Maryland forest while making a documentary about a legendary 18th-century witch. Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard and Michael Williams star. Directed by Eduardo Sanchez and Daniel Myrick. (cc)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: A pool hustler mentors a talented young player and his street-smart girlfriend, but his attempts to corrupt the young man make him reassess his own decisions in life. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: East Side Sushi
programme.desc: A street vendor lands a job at a sushi restaurant where she finds her only obstacle is gender bias. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman's Show
programme.desc: Kate Middleton's mother babysits Prince George; Maggie Smith mulls an action movie franchise; a zookeeper misses her favorite monkey; American tourists see a darker side of Britain; a vicar is late for a funeral and turns to social media for help. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman's Show
programme.desc: In the Season 1 finale, Judi Dench rides the bus; an app designer celebrates his first anniversary at a café; an executive visits some of her businesses; a modeling agent finds a new face; and a woman makes plans to go out with her mother. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Appaloosa
programme.desc: Two gunmen become the marshal and deputy of a lawless Old West mining town and take on a corrupt rancher (Jeremy Irons). Ed Harris directed and costars with Viggo Mortensen, Renée Zellweger and Lance Henriksen. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Robin Hood Men in Tights
programme.desc: A veteran of the Crusades brings together a ragtag group to do battle against an evil king, and gets help from a surprising source inside the royal castle in this spoof of the Robin Hood legend. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: This thriller follows the rise and fall of Ronald and Reginald Kray, identical twin gangsters who built a criminal empire in London during the 1950s and '60s using gruesome, unhinged tactics and savvy business acumen. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her diabetic preteen daughter hide in a fortified, high-tech, hidden chamber when thieves break into their New York City home, but more problems arise after they leave behind the girl's medications. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This biopic of literary editor Max Perkins centers on his personal and professional relationship with eccentric author Thomas Wolfe. As Wolfe becomes consumed with his lengthy novels, Perkins struggles to reel in his talent in order to deliver another best-seller for Scribner Publishing during the 1930s. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A love triangle breaks out when a hard-drinking 1920s pro-football player signs an All-American college star and war hero to help his floundering franchise, and they both fall for a rookie reporter. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Robin Hood Men in Tights
programme.desc: A veteran of the Crusades brings together a ragtag group to do battle against an evil king, and gets help from a surprising source inside the royal castle in this spoof of the Robin Hood legend. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Making 'Neighbors 2 Sorority Rising'
programme.desc: A look at "Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising," a sequel to the 2014 comedy that finds a young couple plagued by yet another Greek menace: the sisters of Kappa Kappa Nu. The film stars Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Chloë Grace Moretz, and is directed by Nicholas Stoller. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Isobel Yeung reports from Turkey as citizens head to the polls in a nationwide referendum that grants President Recep Tayyip Erdogan unprecedented power. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, the illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their names and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. However, the mogul soon turns the tables, and forces the group to steal a revolutionary decrypting device for him. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Tour de Pharmacy
programme.desc: Sports-doping spoof focusing on a fictional, world-class cycling event in 1982 that was marred by one controversy after another, as recalled by five riders, commentators, celebrities and other assorted ne'er-do-wells. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Towelhead
programme.desc: Twisted black comedy about the sexual awakening of a 13-year-old Lebanese-American girl growing up in Houston during the first Gulf War. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Citizen U.S.A. A 50 State Road Trip
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi's patriotic travelogue crisscrosses the U.S. to attend naturalization ceremonies in all 50 states and listens to recent immigrants from around the world explain their decision to become American citizens. The film is inspired by the naturalization process experienced by Pelosi's Dutch-born husband, Michiel Vos. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: In 1960s South Carolina, a young white girl and her black caregiver are taken in by an eccentric trio of sisters, in this adaptation of the best seller by Sue Monk Kidd. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can
programme.desc: A charming 1960s con man poses as a pilot, a doctor and a lawyer while eluding a dogged FBI agent who is determined to put him behind bars. Later, the swindler falls in love with the daughter of the District Attorney of New Orleans, LA. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: In this cryptic sci-fi adventure, Roy rescues his son Alton from a religious cult in Texas, whose members worship the boy for his supernatural powers. Along with a state trooper, the pair go on a cross-country journey as they are hunted by federal agents, who believe Alton might be a threat to national security. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Upbeat musical spin on John Waters' 1988 cult hit about a plump, socially conscious teenage girl who shakes up things on a TV dance show in 1962 Baltimore. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: A restaging of the surprise Japanese attack against the backdrop of a love triangle involving a nurse and two fighter pilots. The film was nominated for three Oscars and won one for Best Sound Effects Editing. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart, only to discover she and her new boyfriend have just checked in. (cc)

programme.title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
programme.desc: A rock-and-roll detective who floats through the clubs of Hollywood, picking up women and clients, stumbles into a case involving the death of a heavy metal singer. (cc)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: An ex-convict tries to go straight, but while running a nightclub his drug-addicted lawyer and an ambitious young criminal make it difficult for him to get out of the life. Meanwhile, he tries to win back the woman he loves who doesn't trust that he's trying to stay on the right side of the law. (cc)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: Will Holloway, a former MI-5 agent, is forced to partner with Harry Pearce, the man who decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist who escaped during routine prisoner transport and prevent an attack on the city of London. Based on the British television series "Spooks." (cc)

programme.title: Snow White A Tale of Terror

programme.desc: (cc)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This biographical drama explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs in backstage vignettes spanning 14 years, as he and his closest advisers prepare for three different public presentations of era-defining technologies. (cc)

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: A man becomes obsessed with finding his missing girlfriend, but can only find out the truth by entertaining a devil's bargain from her kidnapper. (cc)

programme.title: Deadpool

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The arachnid superhero begins to feel the pressure as he juggles college, a relationship, and the responsibilities of his alter ego, who must take on a cyborg. (cc)

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: Arthur and Norma Lewis (James Marsden and Cameron Diaz) receive a mysterious box that will grant them $1 million if they push the button inside, but they must debate if that's worth the consequence of killing a random person. (cc)

programme.title: Constantine

programme.title: Deadpool

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: A driven police detective and his partner track down a major international drug dealer. They begin by following a couple they suspect because the duo lives far above their apparent means. They continue to follow a trail of clues that leads to a French criminal responsible for a large percentage of the drugs that come into New York City. Best Picture winner. (cc)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: A gifted Polish-Jewish musician struggles to survive WWII in the Warsaw ghetto. During the early days of the Nazi occupation, he imagines himself above the danger. Later, he narrowly escapes deportation to a Nazi concentration camp and goes into hiding in a friend's apartment. When his benefactor goes missing, he spends the next several years dashing from one abandoned home to another, desperate to avoid capture by German occupation troops. (cc)

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: A silly, enthusiastic satire about a dim male supermodel who loses ground to a newcomer, then unwittingly becomes involved in an assassination plot. (cc)

programme.title: Diner
programme.desc: The autobiographical recollections of writer-director Barry Levinson recount the story of five high-school grads on the brink of adulthood in 1959 Baltimore. (cc)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: A burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience. (cc)

programme.title: To Be or Not to Be
programme.desc: A down on his luck Polish actor with a straying wife makes a plan to get them both out of the country and escape the impending horrors of the Nazi invasion. (cc)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: An inept ABA basketball team that is in danger of folding when the league announces plans to merge with the NBA in 1976. (cc)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations. (cc)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision. (cc)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: WWE superstar John Cena stars as Danny Fisher, a New Orleans police detective who must complete a dozen mind-bending puzzles in order to save his beloved fiancée from being murdered by an escaped criminal looking for revenge. Directed by Renny Harlin. (cc)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: "Mad Max" sequel about survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: After the aging starter gets hurt, an old-school, head football coach clashes with the team's new, younger owner and backup quarterback. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: A bank robbery in Brooklyn goes wrong and evolves into a protracted hostage situation, turning the plan's mastermind into a media celebrity and the event into a media circus. Based on a true story. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Men living in a small desert community come upon some inexplicable phenomena, including at least one very grisly body. It turns out that there are gigantic wormlike carnivores living under the desert that come up to feed on humans. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Rowdy friends throw a bachelor party for a groom-to-be, whose future bride infiltrates the bash to test his fidelity. Meanwhile, her rich daddy does his best to stop the wedding. (cc)(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: The lives of a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 14)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 16)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 16)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.sub-title: Welcome Back Catfish!/All the Juice That's Fish to Swim.
programme.desc: Double bill. Catfish Booray returns to Norrisville as a substitute teacher under the Sorcerer's control. Then, a fad for frozen soup hits the school, and as a result Howard suffers a transformation

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Wander picks up a loopy Lord Hater from the dentist, and shows him being good can be fun. Then, Wander heroically faces a ridiculous villain from his past

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Trying to help Spencer get an authentic-sounding scream to use in one of his movies, Billy scares Mallory so badly that she decides to move far away. Then, Spencer wants to buy a piece of horror movie memorabilia, but does not have any money

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When Spencer shoots a Jaws-style movie in his pool, Billy's ectoplasm turns the film's harmless goldfish star into a fearsome aquatic monster. Then, Spencer's sister, Jessica develops a crush on Kleet, and the bully sees an opportunity to spend time at Spencer's house tormenting him

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Mind Games/Strange Kat on a Train.
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop is in trouble for ignoring Millie and is busy trying to stop Kat burying the town under molten lava. Then, Coop and Kat are lured into a trap by an evil alien hamster

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Fangs for the Memories/Drive-in Me Crazy.
programme.desc: Double bill. Dad orders Coop to spend some time with Millie. Then, Coop and Kat destroy the handle of Dad's antique bottle capper during a battle

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy gets McFist thrown out of a cool resort. Then, Howard goes to the centre of the Earth to set the story straight about a lie he told

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Big Trouble in Little Norrisville/Winner Takes Ball.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy accidentally sends Howard on a quest for the final Sorcerer's Ball. Then, Randy and Howard plan to buy an exotic sweet, but end up with an ancient idol, a sorcerer's ball and big trouble

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster uses his powers to save a baby, but telling the truth might mean revealing his secret. Then, Shelby becomes uncontrollable when being used as a water scooter

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Brady gets stung by a Waca Waca bug, and the wound has strange side-effects. This causes problems when Aunt Nancy and Uncle Bill turn up unexpectedly to see him

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: The twins find a creature named Pupaley and keep him as a pet, but soon realise it is hard work. When they start to neglect him, he grows huge and treats them as animals instead

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys build a computer-controlled tower, only for it to develop a mind of its own and imprison them both

programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: Rank The Prank - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters Koala Bunnies (Svetlana and Neptune) and Prank Bosses (James and Caiden) join forces with prosthetics and make-up wiz CJ Goldman and SFX guru Andy Antoine to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. Teams summon wizards and aliens on a busy city street corner and it's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life! But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? Get ready for some gut-busting reactions when Svetlana and Neptune's 'Blizzard-ade' faces off with James and Caiden's 'Alien Crash Landing'. Ranksters ... the choice is yours. And for the winning team, CJ and Andy have planned the ultimate mega prank with the wackiest obstacle course challenge ever created! Exploding cakes, spraying cream and a crazed clown aren't the only obstacles to avoid on this course. If the 'target' is going to make it through, he'll have to dodge a grizzly bear too! It's one huge bear and one hilarious MEGA PRANK!
